headline: Adobe Inc. (ADBE) Faces Mixed Sentiment Amid AI Growth Opportunities
summary: Coatue Management holds $236.24 million worth of shares in Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE), representing 0.66% of its total 13F portfolio, helping the stock secure a place on our list of billionaire Philippe Laffont’s 10 stock picks with huge upside potential. In October 2025, Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) experienced mixed sentiments, with investor optimism over its AI prospects […]

headline: Uptempo 2.0 Empowers CMOs to Slash Waste & Maximize ROI With Clarity and Confidence
summary: ORLANDO, Fla., October 21, 2025--Uptempo, the enterprise marketing operations platform that gives CMOs a single source of truth, announces the launch of Uptempo 2.0.
